<b>Vestigium</b> -<b>ii</b> <br> <small>n.</small>   <p> <b>1</b> &ensp; <small>Cic.</small> &ensp; vestigio, pizada, rasto, pêgada. <br> <b>2</b> &ensp; marca, indicio, signal que resta. </p>   <p><small>[EXEMPLOS]</small><br> <br><b>X</b><br>e uestigio &ensp; <small><small>Cic</small></small> &ensp; <small>Logo, de repente</small> <br> eodem temporis uestigio &ensp; <small><small>Caes</small></small> &ensp; <small>No mesmo instante</small> <br> facere uestigium in possessionem &ensp; <small><small>Cic</small></small> &ensp; <small>Tomar posse de alguma cousa</small> <br> uestigio presso aliquem persequi &ensp; <small><small>Cic</small></small> &ensp; <small>Seguir alguem pé ante pé, ou nos bicos dos pés</small> <br> uestigium equi &ensp; <small><small>Plin</small></small> &ensp; <small>Ferradura do cavallo</small> </p>
